text: Beatriz Aguirre (March 21, 1925 â€“ September 29, 2019) was a Mexican movie and television actress.Hardy p.248 ==Some movies== * The Tiger of Jalisco Rosita (1947) *The Perez Family Clara (1949) * Over the Waves (1950) * Flight 971 (1953) * My Mother Is Guilty (1960) ==Dubbing Animation== *One Hundred and One Dalmatians (1961) - Perdita *The Fox and the Hound (1981) - Widow Tweed *The Great Mouse Detective (1986) - Mrs. Judson *Hercules - Hera *The Hunchback of Notre Dame - Quasimodo's mother *James and the Giant Peach - Mrs. Ladybug (speaking) *Dinosaur - Baylene ==References== ==Bibliography== * Hardy, Phil.
